price: (28) They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."[1290]
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
footnotes: [1290]- i.e., from our position of strength, oppressing us.  Or from where we would have grasped the truth, preventing us.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
